day_1.title: Coffee and Exploration
activities: Morning: Start at Man Versus Machine (Müllerstraße 23) for artisan coffee.
Midday: Visit Roca Junior Artisan Coffee (Kreittmayrstraße 5) for a second coffee stop.
Afternoon: Explore Sweet Spot Kaffee (Heiliggeiststraße 1) and enjoy its cozy atmosphere.
Evening: Walk through the Viktualienmarkt for local food and crafts.

day_2.title: Outdoor and Indoor Mix
activities: Morning: Visit the Englischer Garten (English Garden) for a scenic walk (bring rain gear).
Midday: Head to Nymphenburg Palace Gardens for a mix of history and nature.
Afternoon: Take a break at a nearby coffee shop or explore indoor attractions if the rain intensifies.

day_3.title: Parks and Views
activities: Morning: Walk along the Isar River for a peaceful start to the day.
Midday: Explore Olympiapark (Spiridon-Louis-Ring 21) for panoramic views and walking trails.
Afternoon: Revisit any favorite spots or enjoy a relaxed coffee at Southbank Specialty Coffee.
